entries.description: Now requires a minimum version of 2019.2 to run
Enable Cloud Debugging of ECS Services (beta)
Respect the default region in config file on first start of the IDE
Allow credential_process commands (in aws/config) to produce up to 64KB, permitting longer session tokens
Enabled pasting of key value pairs into the environment variable table of local AWS Lambda run configurations
Fix an IDE error showing up during "SAM local debug" caused by running "docker ps" on the wrong thread
Browsing for files in the Lambda run configuration is now rooted at the project directory
Add an error on empty CloudFormation template or template that lacks a "Resources" section
Rider: Fix unsupported Node runtime showing up in the "Create Serverless Applications" menu
Fix the IDE showing an error sometimes when the SAM template file is invalid
Fix getting SAM version timing out in some circumstances which caused SAM related commands to fail
Fix being able to run "SAM local run" configurations without Docker running
Fix IDE error caused by editor text field being requested at the wrong scope level
Rider: Fix the "Deploy Serverless" menu not appearing when right clicking on the project view
